title: Mtskheta Park
text: Mtskheta Park is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Mtskheta">Mtskheta</a>, <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgia</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium of <a href="FC%20WIT%20Georgia">FC WIT Georgia</a>. The stadium is able to hold 2,000 people.
